title: A Psychopath
creator_credit: Henwar Rodakiewicz, Robert Anderson and Robert Anderson Associates
brief_description: A study of anti-social personality disorders. Presents the case history of a convicted burglar of high intelligence, a psychopath whose criminal tendencies constitute a threat to his community. Filmed at Verdun Protestant Hospital with Dr H. B. Durost as the interviewing psychiatrist and commentator.
